description:
Revert "Clean-up of the asynchronous behaviour of the experimental extension popup API. "

This reverts http://codereview.chromium.org/1512007

TBR=twiz

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=46184

messages.text:
The patch apparently broke browser_test on Release Windows. Sorry for the revert. Please make sure to watch the tree after commit, and to use the release trybots when relanding.

Here are the failure logs:

http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/waterfall/builders/Chromium%20XP/builds/11721/steps/browser_tests/logs/stdio


Note: Google Test filter = ExtensionApiTest.Popup

On Sat, May 1, 2010 at 4:59 AM, <phajdan.jr@chromium.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: Jeff Timanus,
>
> Message:
> The patch apparently broke browser_test on Release Windows. Sorry for the
> revert. Please make sure to watch the tree after commit, and to use the
> release
> trybots when relanding.
>

Thanks for addressing this, Phajdan.  I'll make sure to keep a special eye
on testing the follow-up with the release try-bots.


Jeff
